nodes.documentation:
@title Library to implement items that can accumulate evidences
 @author Roberto García (http://rhizomik.net/~roberto/)
nodes.name: Evidencable

nodes.documentation: @dev Modifier controlling that only registered evidence providers are allowed
nodes.name: onlyEvidenceProvider

nodes.documentation:
@notice Get the evidence count for the manifestation with `hash`.
 @param hash Hash of the manifestation content, for instance IPFS Base58 Hash
nodes.name: getEvidenceCount

nodes.documentation:
@notice Adds one to the evidence count for the manifestation with `hash`.
 @param hash Hash of the manifestation content, for instance IPFS Base58 Hash
nodes.name: addEvidence
addEvidenceProvider
isUnevidenced
